Package Utilities

Package contains every utilities used for many purposes to simplify the software architecture and eliminate method repetition among classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LCDInfo  
    LightPoller
    Class used to polled the light sensor
    Log
    Class used to create log files on the EV3 directory
    robotControls
    This is a utility class which controls all motors
    UltrasonicPoller  
    wifi
    Class allows to collect info via wifi and then parse it
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Log.Sender
    Type of object sending the info to be printed in log

Package Utilities Description

Package contains every utilities used for many purposes to simplify the software architecture and eliminate method repetition among classes.
